rooms.description: Large open-plan living room with floor-to-ceiling windows and Scandinavian design elements. Incorporates a central focal area for family gatherings.
Cozy dining area integrated into the living space with ample natural light and minimalist furnishing.
Spacious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, a private balcony for relaxation, and built-in storage solutions to maintain Scandinavian simplicity.
Comfortable guest room with an adjoining balcony, ensuring privacy while keeping the Scandinavian aesthetic intact.
Chic and functional child's bedroom designed to be versatile for growth. Includes a small balcony area that aligns with Vastu principles by maximizing positive energy.
Dedicated study or office space with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, promoting focus and calm in a Scandinavian environment.

Efficient kitchen designed with an open layout connecting to the living area. Incorporates minimalist cabinetry and functional storage solutions, adhering to both design and Vastu principles for auspicious energy flow.
Well-appointed bathroom with a focus on Scandinavian simplicity and functionality.
Small utility area for appliances and storage, maintaining a clutter-free environment in line with Scandinavian design aesthetics.

openings.description: Modern front door with sliding glass panels to enhance natural light entry while offering security.
Access points for the balconies on the bedrooms, ensuring ample outdoor space and Vastu-aligned orientation.
Floor-to-ceiling sliding windows in living areas and bedrooms to enhance natural lighting and scenic views, following Scandinavian design principles.
